title: Benjamin Brook's works
content: FROM THE REFORMATION UNDER QUEEN ELIZABETH,TO THE ACT OF UNIFORMITY,IN 1662.BY BENJAMIN BROOK.IN THREE VOLUMES.VOL. I.The memory of the just is blessed.The precious spark of liberty had been kindled, and was preserved, bythe Puritans alone; and it was to this Sect that the English owe the whole freedom of their constitution.â€”Hume.
